org.streaminer.stream.cardinality

Interface ICardinality

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdaptiveCounting, CountThenEstimate, HyperLogLog, HyperLogLogPlus, LinearCounting, LogLog

    public interface ICardinality
    Interface for algorithms that calculate the cardinality over a data stream.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long cardinality() 
      byte[] getBytes()

      Merges estimators to produce a new estimator for the combined streams of this estimator and those passed as arguments.

    • Method Detail

      • offer

        boolean offer(Object o)
        Parameters:
        o - stream element
        Returns:
        false if the value returned by cardinality() is unaffected by the appearance of o in the stream.

      • offerHashed

        boolean offerHashed(long hashedLong)
        Offer the value as a hashed long value
        Parameters:
        hashedLong - - the hash of the item to offer to the estimator
        Returns:
        false if the value returned by cardinality() is unaffected by the appearance of hashedLong in the stream

      • offerHashed

        boolean offerHashed(int hashedInt)
        Offer the value as a hashed long value
        Parameters:
        hashedInt - - the hash of the item to offer to the estimator
        Returns:
        false if the value returned by cardinality() is unaffected by the appearance of hashedInt in the stream

      • cardinality

        long cardinality()
        Returns:
        the number of unique elements in the stream or an estimate thereof

      • sizeof

        int sizeof()
        Returns:
        size in bytes needed for serialization

      • getBytes

        byte[] getBytes()
                throws IOException
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException

      • merge

        ICardinality merge(ICardinality... estimators)
                   throws CardinalityMergeException
        Merges estimators to produce a new estimator for the combined streams of this estimator and those passed as arguments. Nor this estimator nor the one passed as parameters are modified.
        Parameters:
        estimators - Zero or more compatible estimators
        Returns:
        The merged data structure
        Throws:
        CardinalityMergeException - If at least one of the estimators is not compatible with this one
